Html:
First, thank you WPF Team for the DataGrid.  It's fantastic.

Now, please open it up.  It's fine for simple applications, but once you want to do anything really special it's a pain.  Let binding be optional (allow rows to be added manually).  Actually, I think you can just take away a lot of functionality.  It would make my life (and I think many people's lives who use it) much easier.
